item.title: Three methods to determine confidence interval (CI) for ROC curve in Python
item.description: Scenario: With the set of scores and binary class labels, you succesfully plotted the ROC (Receiver Operative Characteristic ) curve and computed its AUC (area und curve) with scikit-learn from python: import numpy as np #y_pred: numpy array of scores predicted by your model y_pred = np.array([0.8556125820831081, 0.1638014063083847, ..., 0.08512761636008265]) #y_true: numpy array of original class labels of your dataset y_true = np.array([1, 1,..., 0]) from sklearn.metrics import roc_auc_score print("Original ROC area: {:0.
